entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
